Pre-Game Insights: Sacramento Kings finished the previous season with a record of 46-36 overall and 30-22 in Western Conference play. The Kings averaged 116.6 points per game while shooting 47.7% from the field and 36.6% from behind the arc.
Los Angeles Clippers went 51-31 overall, 9-7 in Pacific Division games and 26-15 on the road a season ago.
Others: The game is scheduled for Friday, 10 p.m. EST in Sacramento, California.
Injury updates: Devin Carter, Kevin Huerter, and Orlando Robinson are out for the Kings. Mo Bamba, P.J. Tucker, and Kawhi Leonard are out for the Clippers.
